body: Oh, I see. I didn't need to add those because I included in my files `<THC/THC.h>`, which [includes `cuda.h` and `cuda_runtime.h`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THC/THCGeneral.h.in#L12-L13).
body_html: Oh, I see. I didn't need to add those because I included in my files <THC/THC.h>, which includes cuda.h and cuda_runtime.h.
body_text: Oh, I see. I didn't need to add those because I included in my files <THC/THC.h>, which includes cuda.h and cuda_runtime.h.
